caption: In front of a temple, a group of people is holding cups, and they drink the liquid from the cups. A group of shirtless police officers are running in formation on the road. One of them fires a gun. Inside an office, several police officers are present. A man walks out through an iron gate onto a forest path. People are practicing boxing, and others are vandalizing vehicles. The scene repeatedly switches to a man answering the phone. A prisoner holding a sign appears. The scene moves to a room where two men are sitting in chairs, looking at a room filled with sound equipment. One of them takes a product from a cabinet and hands it to the other. On the street, there is a hearse parked. Two people are standing on the rooftop of a tall building, having a conversation. There are many water pipes on the rooftop.

global.question: When does it happen in the video, ancient age, modern age or future?
Do more than 5 people appear in the video?
Does the story most probably happen in Aisa or Europe?
Are there more then three different backgrounds appearing in the video?

breakpoint.question: Wherea are the two people?
breakpoint.answer: On the roof of a building.
